text: Vin pidnyav yoho batʹkiv na tron. Vony vpaly prostrate pered tym, yak yo. Vin skazav, "O miy batʹko, tse yavlyaye soboyu fulfillment moyeyi staroyi mriyi. Miy Lord vstyhutyy spravdzhuyutʹsya. Vin blahoslovyv meni, dostavyv meni z tyurmy, ta prynis vam z pusteli, pislya chorta zahnaly klyn mizh meni ta moyi braty. Miy Lord ye Naybilʹsh Lyub'yaznyy do whomever Vin wills. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Knower, naybilʹsh Mudryy
